snippet: Their momentum gone and the Pittsburgh Steelers surging behind backup quarterback Landry Jones, the New England Patriots needed something to get them going....
lead_paragraph: Their momentum gone and the Pittsburgh Steelers surging behind backup quarterback Landry Jones, the New England Patriots needed something to get them going.

headline.main: Blount, Patriots Pull Away From Steelers 27-16
headline.print_headline: Blount, Patriots Pull Away From Steelers 27-16
